statements: UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status='Approved' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET study_end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE patient_id=100;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = 'Approved' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET study_start_date = '2022-01-01', study_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE patient_id = 5 AND researcher_id = 10
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research SET audit_trail = 'Updated audit trail for study XYZ' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_documents SET document_name = 'Updated Document Name', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE doc_id = 5;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_audit_trails_pharmaceutical_research SET research_topic = 'New Research Topic' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_documents SET document_type = 'Regulatory Approval' , document_name = 'Updated Document Name' WHERE doc_id = 5;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE pharmaceutical_research SET research_status = 'completed', researcher_name = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE research_id = 100;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE audit_trails SET user_id = 123, event_type = 'Data Modified' WHERE event_id = 5;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_date = '2022-08-30' WHERE drug_name = 'DrugA';
UPDATE research_results SET publication_date = '2023-01-15', result_description = 'Updated result description' WHERE project_id = 101;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_date = '2022-10-15', drug_name = 'New Drug X' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_results SET publication_date = '2022-09-25', result_description = 'Significant findings in phase 2 trials' WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status='Updated' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_accounts SET role='Admin' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = 'Complete' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_accounts SET role = 'Administrator', email = 'admin@example.com' WHERE username = 'admin';
